author: TooMuchLEGO
title: Accelerating to top speed...
review: When you take a look at this set, you may think it not your worthwhile. But this set is quite great. The build is fun, and the minifigure is really neat. Not to mention that the end result is fantastic too. I guess the only problem I can see is that there isn't a whole lot of playability- there is only one car, which means that you won't exactly be able to have a huge race (maybe a race against time?) unless you have more race cars handy. But overall, this set puts a smile on my face, and I hope it does on your's too.
